SEARCH
Package com.pomodorotimer.pomodorotimer

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
com.pomodorotimer.pomodorotimer.Graph
public class Graph extends Object
Graph implementation for BFS and DFS algorithms. Used for maze/graph exploration.

Use-case: Maze/graph exploration where we need to traverse nodes and find paths between them.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Data Structures Project Team

    • shortestPath

      public List<Integer> shortestPath(int start, int end)
      Finds shortest path using BFS.
      Parameters:
      start - starting vertex
      end - destination vertex
      Returns:
      list of vertices representing the shortest path, or empty list if no path exists
